resources.string: Delete a command can not be undone, are you sure?
Invalid command name, please verify your value
Invalid command, please verify your value
Invalid command, no OctoPrint command available
Click here to see the tutorial for %s commands

Printoid allows you to customize your app with your own commands.

 1/ OctoPrint system commands: Printoid is able to execute the commands you have defined in config.yaml

 2/ GCODE commands: you can send your own GCODE commands to your 3D printer. Can be a unique command or a group of commands (separated by carriage returns)

 3/ SSH commands: you can send instructions to your Raspberry Pi over SSH, such as GPIO or script execution commands for example

 4/ CURL commands: you can send instructions to your Raspberry Pi over CURL commands (should looks like command?enable=relay1 or api/plugin/psucontrol in Printoid, for example, with an eventual JSON argument)

 More informations on the official website https://printoid.net
You already have selected %d commands to display on the home screen.\n\nPlease deselect one of them before adding this one.
Printoid will send the following command: %s\n\nAre you sure?

Your PSU is actually ON.

Your PSU is actually OFF.\n\nDo you want to turn it ON right now?

If you are currently printing, the current job will be aborted and the progress will be lost.

There are no OctoPrint system commands for this profile. You can configure some new system commands in the config.yaml of OctoPrint.
